eBayes for MArrayLM2

Source: R/fitMixedModelDE.R
eBayes-method.Rd

eBayes for result of linear mixed model for with dream() using residual degrees of freedom approximated with rdf.merMod()

Usage

# S4 method for class 'MArrayLM2'
eBayes(
  fit,
  proportion = 0.01,
  stdev.coef.lim = c(0.1, 4),
  trend = FALSE,
  span = NULL,
  robust = FALSE,
  winsor.tail.p = c(0.05, 0.1),
  legacy = NULL
)

Arguments

fit

fit

proportion

proportion

stdev.coef.lim

stdev.coef.lim

trend

trend

span

span

robust

robust

winsor.tail.p

winsor.tail.p

legacy

legacy

Value

results of eBayes using approximated residual degrees of freedom

See also

dream(), rdf.merMod(), limma::eBayes()
